value: After 6 months working, we are pleased to present version 0.2-RC, marking a significant milestone in the project's structure and our approach to knowledge sharing.

In this version, the History Tracers has undergone several improvements, including:

  • Addition of a local web server, enabling users to access content locally.
  • Addition of new families to the genealogical section.
  • Support for three languages (English, Portuguese, and Spanish).
  • Expansion of content in the Indigenous section, providing a deeper understanding of these communities.
  • Introduction of the "Class" section, where various sciences are taught together, aiding comprehension of diverse historical texts.
  • Text updates to incorporate different calendars (Work in Progress).
  • Grammatical revision with the assistance of artificial intelligence (Work in Progress).

We wish everyone an enriching learning experience and hope you'll enjoy the new functionalities!
